item.title: FAMU cancels on-campus classes Friday after nationwide threats toward HBCUs
item.description: Florida A&M University is canceling on-campus classes on Friday due to recent threats to HBCUs around the country.

item.title: DC cancels comic book series after writer’s post about Charlie Kirk on social media
item.description: DC Comics has canceled the just-released “Red Hood” comic book series after the author made inflammatory comments about Charlie Kirk’s death.
